mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(title, content, user_id, created_at) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT bt.*, ut.username, FORMATDATETIME(bt.created_at, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AS createdAtFormat, COUNT(ct.id) AS commentCount FROM board_tb bt INNER JOIN user_tb ut ON bt.user_id = ut.id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment_tb ct ON bt.id = ct.board_id GROUP BY bt.id ORDER BY bt.created_at DESC;
